channel.description: Recent content in Andrewlock.net on .NET Ramblings

item.title: Is the result pattern worth it?: Working with the result pattern - Part 4
item.description: In this post I show how to extend your LINQ-based result pattern code to handle more scenarios, such as Task> and collections of Result Link to article: https://andrewlock.net/working-with-the-result-pattern-part-4-is-the-result-pattern-worth-it/

item.title: Adding more extensions to Result<T>: Working with the result pattern - Part 3
item.description: In this post I show how to extend your LINQ-based result pattern code to handle more scenarios, such as Task> and collections of Result Link to article: https://andrewlock.net/working-with-the-result-pattern-part-3-adding-more-extensions/
